about.title: About Me
body: I investigate adaptive inference systems for large language models at the Keio University SFC Research Institute, focusing on dynamic quantization and runtime model selection for HPC environments.
My work bridges academic research with production-grade implementations through collaborations and industry internships, delivering measurable acceleration for real-world NLP and retrieval systems.
